publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4063.1 Ms Sandra White: International Women’s Day, 8 March 2006—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4063) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert at end "however, notes that 30 years after the Sex Discrimination Act 1975 came into force, the pace of change remains painfully slow; further notes with great concern the trafficking of women throughout Europe, and calls on the Executive to do all in its power to stop this horrific practice."
